title: purahara nandana
sahitya:
purahara nandana ripukula bhanjana shikhIndra vAhana mahEndra pAlana


caraNam   karuNAmrta sAgara taruNAmrta kara shEkhara suravairi 
kAla puravairi bAla gurugha sarasijakara skanda lIla
			(ciTTasvara)
p m2 p g, m1 r s  m1 g p m2 d p S, n S R S R, S n  S, n d p m2 p,   ( 2 )
g m1 r s  n S d p  G M1 R S  n S d p p m2 p S  n S n d  p d p m2  g m1 r s ( 2 )
